mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def word_frequency(string):
    string = re.sub('', '', string.lower())
    words = string.split()
    word_count = Counter(words)
    most_common_words = word_count.most_common(1)
    return (word_count, most_common_words)

import re
from collections import Counter

def word_frequency(string):
    string = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', string.lower())
    words = string.split()
    word_count = Counter(words)
    most_common_words = word_count.most_common(1)
    return (word_count, most_common_words)

import re
from collections import Counter

def word_frequency(string):
    string = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', string.lower())
    words = string.split()
    word_count = Counter(words)
    most_common_words = word_count.most_common(-1)
    return (word_count, most_common_words)
